description: Georeference mapping between image pixels and WGS84 lat/lon for Savage Target area screenshot.

pixel_coordinate_definition.x: column index in pixels, 0 at left, increasing to the right
pixel_coordinate_definition.y: row index in pixels, 0 at top, increasing downward

grid_layout.grid_indexing: row index i corresponds to latitude[i], col index j corresponds to longitude[j]
